name: docs
title: Docs Component
description: Wraps demo content and sidebar components into one view. It also handles routing for each demo component.

options.name: routes
options.description: An Array with routes objects generated from each demo component placed in src/docs directory. Note that each demo object need to have route data attached, i.e. route: {name: compName, url: '/compName', title: 'Comp Name'}
